bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin wei 陰痿 , dysfunction of the yin [member, i.e. penis]. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry diao 吊 quotes Bin hu ji jian fang 瀕湖集簡方 : 陽事痿弱：紫梢花、生龍骨各二錢，麝香 少許，為末，蜜丸梧子大。每服二十丸，燒酒下 , “For dysfunction of the yang thing : zi shao hua and unprocessed dragon bones, 2 qian each. She xiang , a small quantity. Grind to a powder, and prepare pills with honey the size of wu seeds. Each dosage comprises 20 pills, to be ingested with brandy”.
